## MenuComponent class

The MenuComponent does all the work, it only needs a Menu implementation and a target element to which the html should be appended to

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MenuComponent extends EventListenerClass implements EventListenerObject 
```
**Extends:** [EventListenerClass](./forms42core.eventlistener_2.md)

**Implements:** EventListenerObject
